---
title: IMobileSyncApi.mobilesync_client_free method
---

Disconnects a mobilesync client from the device and frees up the mobilesync client data. MOBILESYNC_E_SUCCESS on success MOBILESYNC_E_INVALID_ARG if is NULL.

```csharp
public MobileSyncError mobilesync_client_free(IntPtr client)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| client | The mobilesync client to disconnect and free. |
